auth.visitCorrectUrl: Please check that you are visiting the correct URL
auth.agreeTerms: I have read and agree to Terms of Service.
auth.securityNotification: For security purposes, no withdrawals are permitted for 24 hours after modification of security methods.
auth.enterAccountEmail: Enter the account email to reset the password.
auth.toSecureYourAccount: To secure your account, please complete the following verification.
auth.ifYouLoseYourPassword: If you lose your password and security items, please contact our CS team.
auth.pleaseEnterEmailVerificationCode: Please enter the verification code that was sent to your email.
auth.pleaseEnterSmsVerificationCode: Please enter the verification code that was sent to your phone.
auth.pleaseEnterGoogleVerificationCode: Please enter google one time code.
auth.failedRegisterAccount: Sorry, failed to register new account. Please try again.
auth.failedResetPassword: Sorry, failed to reset password. Please try again.
auth.failedActivateAccount: Sorry, failed to activate your account. Please try again.
auth.gladRegister: We are so glad you registered for CABINETEX.
auth.sentActivationEmail: We've already sent an account activation email.
auth.twoFactorSet: Two factor authenticator is set successfully.

validation.inputMobile: Please enter a valid phone number.
validation.inputCorrectEmail: Please enter a correct email address.
validation.inputCorrectPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters with 1 upper case letter and 1 number.
validation.termsOfServices: I am over 18 age, and I agree to CABINETEX's Terms.
validation.passwordsAreSame: New and old secrets are the same.
validation.incorrectEmailOrPassword: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
validation.accountDeactivated: This account is not activated yet.
validation.failedSendingVerificationCode: Sorry, failed to send verification code. Please try again.
validation.failedEnableSmsVerificationCode: Sorry, failed to enable sms authentication. Please try again.
validation.failedEnableGoogleVerificationCode: Sorry, failed to enable google authentication. Please try again.
validation.failedChangePassword: Sorry, failed to change login password. Maybe old password is not correct. Please try again.
validation.withdrawAmountOverflowed: Please enter a valid amount to withdraw.

idleActivity.title: Session Timout Warning
idleActivity.text1: You're being timed out due to inactivity.
idleActivity.text2: Please choose to "Stay Logged In" to keep your session.
idleActivity.text3: Otherwise you will be logged out automatically.

securityVerification.securityLevelOfYourAccount: The security level of your account is low. Please enable one more security feature.

changeLoginPassword.forSecurityPurposes: For security purposes NO withdrawals are permitted for 24 hours after modification of security methods.

google.downloadAndInstall: Download and install the Google Authenticator app
google.scanThisQrCode: Scan this QR code in the Google Authenticator app.
google.unableToScan: If you are unable to scan the QR code, please enter this code manually into the app
google.saveThisKey: Please save this Key on paper. This Key will allow you to recover your Google Authenticator in case of phone loss.
google.resettingGoogleAuthentication: Resetting your Google Authentication requires opening a support ticket and takes at least 7 days to process.

welcome.fewMoreSteps: Just a few more steps and you’re good to go!
welcome.secureYourAccount: Secure your account with two-factor authentication
welcome.addCash: Add cash or crypto funds to your wallet and start trading right away.

security.usedForWithdrawals: Used for withdrawals and security modifications

overview.spotTradingAccount: This is your spot trading account. Simply transfer funds to start trading on the world’s leading crypto exchange instantly!
overview.peerToPeer: With Binance Peer-to-Peer (P2P), you can trade cryptocurrencies directly with other users or businesses for a better trading experience.

deposit.firstNotice: If you have deposited, please pay attention to the text messages, site letters and emails we send to you.
deposit.secondNotice: Coins will be deposited after {{count}} network confirmations.
deposit.thirdNotice: Until 2 confirmations are made, an equivalent amount of your assets will be temporarily unavailable for withdrawals.
deposit.failedGetWalletInfo: Sorry, failed to get wallet information. Please try again.
deposit.failedCreateWalletAddress: Sorry, failed to create wallet address. Please try again.
deposit.sendOnlyCoin: Send only {{currency}} to this deposit address.
deposit.sendingCoin: Sending coin or token other than {{currency}} to this address may result in the loss of your deposit.

withdraw.warning2Fa: Please turn on 2-Factor Authentication for security, and otherwise withdrawal cannot be submitted. You can turn it on
withdraw.firstNotice: Funds can only been withdrawn from your spot account. To withdraw funds in other accounts, please transfer to your spot account first.
withdraw.secondNotice: If you withdraw to a Binance deposit address, the withdrawal fee will be returned to your account.
withdraw.thirdNotice: Do not withdraw directly to a crowdfund or ICO address, as your account will not be credited with tokens from such sales.
withdraw.failedWithdraw: Sorry, failed to withdraw. Please try again.
withdraw.failedWithdrawUntil: You are not able to withdraw until {{time}} due to update for security setting.
withdraw.withdrawExceedLimit: You cannot withdraw your funds due to exceeding 24h withdrawal limitation.  Please upgrade your Tier level first to increase withdrawal amount.
withdraw.withdrawAmountLimit: You can withdraw {{amount}}{{currencyCode}} only due to exceeding 24h withdrawal limitation.  Please upgrade your Tier level first to increase withdrawal amount.
withdraw.noBalance: You cannot withdraw due to zero balance.
withdraw.lessThanMinWithdrawAmount: You cannot withdraw because available balance is less than min withdraw amount.
withdraw.sentConfirmationLink: We have just sent a confirmation link to your email address.  Please check your inbox to confirm your withdrawal request.
withdraw.transferNetworkDescription: Please ensure that the deposit and withdrawal are on the same network, otherwise the withdrawal will fail. The different impacts of the network are rates, minimum withdrawal amount, and transfer time.

wallet.inOrderDescription: Locked: the amount of tokens that has been used in any outstanding orders. Once the order terminates (either filled, canceled or expired), the locked amount will decrease.

withdraw.yourWithdrawalRequestValidated: Your withdrawal request is successfully validated. It will be processed in a few minutes.
withdraw.failedConfirm: Sorry, failed to confirm transaction. Please try again.
